text: "Don't Stop Me Now" is a 1979 song by Queen and is taken from their seventh studio album Jazz. It went to number 9 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in Ireland, number 14 in the Netherlands and number 86 in the United States. It was covered by McFly in 2006. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Queen (band) songs Category:McFly songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:LGBT songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Power pop songs
title: Don't Stop Me Now
